title: PRI's The World: 02/03/2015
teaser: A rug dealer and collector has noticed a change in Afghan rug weaving in the past few years: More and more rugs are featuring images of drones. Plus, a trip to California's Central Valley to find out what the Obama Administration's recent immigration policy changes might mean for workers and farmers there. Also, naked men on panthers. They're bronze statues, and a professor at Cambridge University says that they were probably sculpted by none other than Michelangelo!
